long_description: If you're considering trying clipless pedals for the first time, the Look Keo Easy pedals are easier than other clipless pedals to get in and out of for simplified use. Pedals are made of a tough composite material to withstand regular use and help keep weight low. Large contact area between pedal and cleat provides excellent stability and good power transfer. Pedals spin smoothly around the chromoly spindles thanks to double-sealed bearings. Pedals come with grey Look Keo grip cleats, which offer 4.5deg of float and feature nonslip rubber contact points to enhance traction when walking off-bike. Look Keo Easy road pedals come with pedals, cleats and mounting hardware; compatible with most road cycling shoes with 3-hole mounts.
short_description: If you're considering trying clipless pedals for the first time, the Look Keo Easy pedals are easier than other clipless pedals to get in and out of for simplified use.
